SRP.A: The peak of  Container Ship is to the {left} of the peak of Rail Freight.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Air Cargo} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =20469.8?
EVJ.A: At X =20469.8,the label with the highest density is {Barge}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 17723? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Rail Freight}'s peak at {37187},{Barge}'s peak at {29079},{Cargo Truck}'s peak at {42543}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 23557? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Pipeline}'s peak at {6456},{Container Ship}'s peak at {4454},{Air Cargo}'s peak at {5856},{Courier Services}'s peak at {9359}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Container Ship or Cargo Truck?
NC.A: {Cargo Truck} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Barge or Rail Freight?
NC.A: {Rail Freight} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Rail Freight or Container Ship?
NC.A: {Rail Freight} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Air Cargo or Container Ship?
NC.A: {Air Cargo} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Air Cargo}
